data.title: All about Christel Khalil | Net worth, career, biography, age
data.meta_description: Adnan Christel Mina Khalil is an American actress better known by her stage name Christel Khalil. The roles of Lily Winters on CBS's The Young and the
data.text:
Adnan Christel Mina Khalil is an American actress better known by her stage name Christel Khalil. The roles of Lily Winters on CBS’s The Young and the Restless and Cornelia Hale on Cartoon Network’s WITCH are where Khalil is most recognized for her work.

She has been a member of the soap opera’s cast since 2002, and in 2012 she was recognized for her work by receiving the Daytime Emmy Award for Outstanding Younger Actress in a Drama Series.

For the same role, he received one Soap Opera Digest Award, two Young Artist Awards, seven NAACP Image Awards, five Daytime Emmy Awards, and seven NAACP Image Awards.

What is Christel Khalil’s net worth? Salary, Earnings

Christel Khalil is a successful actress. Her career in the entertainment business provides most of her income.

He has acted in several films, television shows, and theater productions and, as a result of his hard work, has accumulated considerable wealth. Reportedly, her current net worth is $17 million.

Where was Christel Khalil born? Ethnicity, Nationality, Family, Education

On November 30, 1987, Christel Khalil was born in New York City. Christel Adnan With the name Mina Khalil, of course.

He was born in the American metropolis of Los Angeles. She is a citizen of the United States.

Belita Edwards, his mother, and Adnan Khalil, his father, are his parents. She is of multiracial descent.

His mother is of Native American, African American, and European descent, while his father is of Pakistani origin.

Their family of four consists of Adam, Alex and Chris, three older brothers, and Aysha, a younger paternal half-sister. Her zodiac sign at birth is Sagittarius. She identifies as a Christian.

Is Christel Khalil single? Relationship

He later appeared in films such as Chronologia Human, Good Deed/Sorority Stalker and We Need To Talk. My ex-boyfriend Christel Khalil was married and a father. Stephen Hensley, a musician, was her husband.

The union took place in September 2008. The couple gave birth to a boy. She gave birth to her son in a water birth at home. Michael Caden Hensley is the name of her son. The couple legally separated in 2011 and divorced the following year.

She dated Ray Wicks, a bartender, from 2011 to 2015, a period of four years. She is currently dating Canadian businessman Sam Restagno. Since 2016, the couple has been dating.

He lives in Los Angeles with his son.

How did Christel Khalil start her Professional Career?

In 1993, Christel Khalil made her acting debut as Crystal in a cameo role in the American sitcom The Sinbad Show.

Later, he had cameos in the films Dragon Fury (1995), Milo, You’re Invited to Mary-Kate & Ashley’s Christmas Party (1997) and Interview with the Assasin (2002, 2002).

She was part of the CBS show The Young and the Restless in 2002 as Lily Winters. Khalil has played a major role in the soap opera since 2002.

She was nominated for five Daytime Emmy Awards for her role on the soap opera. She finally won one for Best Younger Actress in a Drama Series in June 2012.

Khalil had already won the NAACP Image Award for Outstanding Actress in a Daytime Drama Series earlier that year.

He announced a reduction of his participation in the show in August 2018. Khalil announced that he will continue to appear regularly on the show.

He said he would reduce his position to have more freedom in his personal and professional life. Christel agreed to return to the soap opera regularly in January 2020.

She gained particular fame for providing the voice of Cornelia Hale in the animated series WITCH.

In addition to Family Matters, George & Leo, That’s So Raven, Malcolm in the Middle, NCIS: Los Angeles, and 2 Broke Girls, Khalil had other guest appearances on various television shows.
